name: Sharkgame
description:
Before man, before yachts, and before the oceans themselves, was shark. Shark is back for revenge on the foolish yachters whose relentless pleasure-seeking has reduced Shark's available habitat beyond recognition.

Turn using A and D. Shark is an obligate ram ventilator so he never stops moving or else he dies, look it up. Goals are generally upwards on the screen, so head that way if you're lost.

Eat yachts in one bite and get a cheeky speed boost for doing so, but don't touch the rocks or you will surely die. Hitting a wall will cause the shark to lose some confidence and speed, so please be mindful of his feelings.

Win by chomping the libertine mermaids perched at the top of each level, or win by achieving the fastest shark, or cruising around and eating the most yachts.
